post:
Dear Friends,

Only 3 months after acquiring VikingLayer we are happy to announce new VPS lineup in Sweden, this time more LEB/LET oriented . Servers are hosted on dual X5675 CPUs and Hardware RAID 10 disk array accelerated with battery protected DDR Cache.
We use [Portlane - Nacka Station](**http://www.portlane.com/en/infrastructure/nacka**) as POP in Stockholm. Server is connected to [AS42708](**http://bgp.he.net/AS42708**)

Datacenter info:  
Location: Stockholm - Sweden  
Provider: Portlane  
ASN: [AS42708](**http://bgp.he.net/AS42708**)  
Test IPv4: 192.71.144.14  
Test IPv6: 2a00:1a28:155d:7265:0000:0000:0000:0001  

What to expect from cheapest plan:  
**[Serverbear test for Vargant 1.50€ VPS](http://serverbear.com/benchmark/2015/08/21/bRabxLzenYMK7qFd)**

**Vagrant**  
OpenVZ - Sweden  
1 CPU Core  
128 MB RAM  
5GB RAID10 HDD  
256GB @ 1 Gbit served from [AS42708](**http://bgp.he.net/AS42708**)  
1 IPv4 and own /64 IPv6  
1.5€ p/month - 2 months free on yearly payment  
[ORDER HERE](**https://drserver.net/vikinglayer**)

2 CPU Cores  
256 MB RAM  
10 GB RAID10 HDD  
512GB @ 1 Gbit served from [AS42708](**http://bgp.he.net/AS42708**)  
1 IPv4 and own /64 IPv6  
2.5€ p/month - 2 months free on yearly payment  
[ORDER HERE](**https://drserver.net/vikinglayer**)

[ORDER HERE](**https://drserver.net/vikinglayer**)

5€ p/month - 2 months free on yearly payment  
[ORDER HERE](**https://drserver.net/vikinglayer**)  

VikingLayer is operated by drServer.net one of leading budget VPS providers.

Thank you for your time
